title: Flip-Flop Dynamic Reset and Set
description:
FF_DRE is a edge-triggered D-Flip-Flop with Asynchronous Set and Reset
input. A rising edge at CLK stores the input D to output Q. A TRUE on the
SET or RST input resets or clears the output Q at any time regardless of
CLK. The reset input has priority over the input set. If both are active
(TRUE) are reset is processed and SET is ignored.
name: FF_DRE

input.name: SET
input.description: Input to set the output Q to high.

input.name: D
input.description: Data input that determines the value of output Q when CLK is high.

input.name: CLK
input.description: Clock input that triggers the update of output Q on its rising edge.

input.name: RST
input.description: Input to reset the output Q.

output.name: Q
output.description: Output that represents the state of the flip-flop.
